          <title>
            <string language="en">The first Periodic Table</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die erste periodische Tabelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le premier Tableau périodique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A primeira tabela periódica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La prima Tabella periodica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο πρώτος περιοδικός πίνακας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El primer vector periódico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how Newland arranged the elements in order according to their masses.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elements</string>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Newland</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">periodic table</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Newland die Elemente in
der Ordnung entsprechend ihren Massen ordnete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment Newland a 
arrangé les éléments dans la commande selon leurs masses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como Newland arranjou os 
elementos em ordem de acordo com suas massas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come Newland ha 
organizzato gli elementi nell'ordine secondo le loro masse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς Newland 
τακτοποίησε τα στοιχεία στην κατάταξη σύμφωνα με τις μάζες τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo Newland arregló 
los elementos en orden según sus masas.</string>
          </description>
